description:
Create server with "os-security-groups:security_groups": [{"name": "test1"}]

But the response of create was "security_groups": [{"name": "default"}]
title: Return wrong server's extended of security group's attributes for v3

comments.content:
Create server with "os-security-groups:security_groups": [{"name": "test1"}]

But the response of create was "security_groups": [{"name": "default"}]

And the response should be include extension's alias as prefix

And this extension support for both native and neutron securitygroup, it should be only support neutrons'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~xuhj

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/45437
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

commit e8169e7e7b8dd5eda522559207a5b971133a5270
Author: He Jie Xu <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Sep 10 18:55:08 2013 +0800

    Fix create's response is different with requested for sec-grps V3
    
    The create's response always shows the default security-groups even the request
    with different security-groups.
    
    Fix bug 1221651
